attributes.title: Bauer Composite Hockey Stick
attributes.description: Bauer Composite Hockey Sticks are made in China. They are made of 20% graphite and 80% fibreglass.
Stick tape comes in a variety of colours. It is used world-wide and continues to be a huge part of hockey.
attributes.title: Stick Tape

attributes.description: Bauer Sticks are shipped in to the College for the GC State Girls Hockey Team.
attributes.title: GC Girls Hockey Team

attributes.description:
Bauer Composite Hockey Sticks are made in China. At the production plants they design the sticks to have the flex and grip that everyone wants in a great stick. Bauer has designed their sticks to perform with anyone's style of hockey, giving lots of options, for both power forwards or defence. They are made of 20% graphite and 80% fibreglass. Graphite is a mineral and comes from the Earth's surface. Fibreglass was originally from the United States, but now is world-wide. The tape that is used for hockey sticks in made in the United States as well. 

In the video below it explains how the Bauer Vapour X60 is at the top of the line and how Bauer has made it better for everyone that uses it with a different design.
attributes.title: Production of Sticks

attributes.description: Fibreglass is made world-wide now, but originally was produced in the United States.
attributes.title: Fibreglass
